title: mRNA salads....
cleaned_text:
Vaccines in your salad? Scientists growing medicine-filled plants to replace injections​

Vaccinations can be a controversial subject for many people, especially when it comes to injections. So what if you could replace your next shot with a salad instead? Researchers at the University of California-Riverside are working on a way to grow edible plants that carry the same medication as an mRNA vaccine.The COVID-19 vaccine is one of the many inoculations which use messenger RNA (mRNA) technology to defeat viruses.One way or another the New World Order will make you get the bio-weapon spike protein.
